name: Aakash Gupta
summary: A competent student, pursuing Computer Science, specializing in Information Systems and Data Science.

currentRole.title: Data Scientist
currentRole.summary:
- Developing innovative and novel methodologies to utilize social data to analyse brands’ positioning and
 hypothesising drivers of insights for the qualitative team
- Developed solutions to analyse and model reviews of a product to observe and understand user behaviour
- Worked with PepsiCo, Oxfam Netherlands, and Formula One to identify key content of interest for project

previousRoles.title: Summer Analyst - Technology
previousRoles.summary:
- Developed the POC for Report Traceability Dashboard which illustrates the relationship between various
 market reports and their corresponding books and feeds
- Interacted with various stakeholders to come up with the requirements and specifications of the dashboard
- Reduced the extraction of data from 20 minutes to a couple of minutes by coming up with complex SQL
 queries

previousRoles.title: Intern
previousRoles.summary:
- Developed a SharePoint solution to simplify the management of machines and used PerformancePoint
 Services to deploy a tool to help the management take various machine-related-decisions
- Designed a dashboard to monitor the production performance of the personalization department using
 Macros, Java, HTML, CSS, and JavaScript
- Improved overall efficiency by reducing man-hours from 3-4 hours to a couple of minutes on machine
 tracking

educationEntries.activities_and_societies: Red Cross Youth NTU Chapter, NTU Students' Union, Earthlink NTU, Rotaract Club of NTU, NTU Sikh Cultural and Literary Society, NTU Computer Society

educationEntries.course_title: All India Senior School Certificate Examination
